pawichchi kara iwatha damana si. ef. el. balb winasha kirima sandaha kramawath wadapiliwelak madhyama parisara adhikariya kriyathmaka kirimata yayi.me pilibandawa si. ef. el. balb aanayanaya karana wyaparikayan samaga sakachchawak da madhyama parisara adhikariye sabhapathi charitha herath mahatha wisin pawathwanu labiya.me sandaha nawa yojana dekak danatamath idiripath wi athi athara masa dekak thula ema wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana bawa charitha herath mahatha kiya.ee anuwa ithama keti kalayakadi me balb winasha kerenu atha.2009 regu wartha anuwa si. ef. el. balb miliyana 12.3kda ayi. ef. el. balb miliyana 13 kda shri lankawata aanayana kara athi namuth eewa bhawitha kirimen pasu winasha kirima sandaha kisidu wadapiliwelak methek kriyathmaka nowiya.mese bhawitha kara iwath karana balb nagarikawa marga depasa ha kasala godawal walata damima puruddak karagena athi athara eewayin minisata ha parisarayata wishala washayen ahithakara prathapala labe.si. ef. el. balb sadima sandaha widuru tiyub ekaka gas ha rasadiya sanyoga kerena athara ema rasadiya hanikara rasayanika drawyayak nisa eewa minisatath parisarayatath ahithakara we.ema nisa eewa winasha kirime yanthranaya ithama awashya bawa herath mahatha kiyayi..
